results.name: Number of ways to tile a 6 X n room with 1x2 Tatami mats. At most 3 Tatami mats may meet at a point.
link: R. J. Mathar, Paving rectangular regions with rectangular tiles,...., arXiv:1311.6135 [math.CO], Table 5.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,1,0,1).
xref: Cf. A068931 for incongruent tilings, A068920 for more info.
results.author: _Dean Hickerson_, Mar 11 2002
ext: G.f. proposed by Maksym Voznyy checked and corrected by R. J. Mathar, Sep 16 2009.
